name: 30 Birds - demo
description:
30 Birds is an adventure game project inspired by Persian painting and mythology. In a city made of giant floating lanterns, you follow Zig as she's trying to wake the local Goddess : Simurgh - a super giant bird. To succeed, she'll have to gather 30 bird's contacts on her phone (+ voodoo, probably...)

In this demo, you'll help Zig to find the first bird, Hoop the hoopoe, and a new cellphone. You will meet all kind of quirky characters, find a few mysterious items, and play music on a djinn's magic sound system...

The whole prototype is playable with a gamepad or keyboard+mouse (you can switch from gamepad to mouse+keyboard and vice versa). XBox pad is fully supported, others are not tested.

Controls :

A / Space / Return (enter) : main button, interaction, talk, submit

B / Escape : cancel button, exit (skip) dialogue, exit phone

Start / P key : pause / phone / quit (the quit option is in the phone)

Left joystick / Arrow keys / WASD keys : move Zig around, navigate

Right joystick : move camera

Bumpers LB-RB / E key - R key : navigate phone, rotate cage

Made by ~ram ram~, a small team across France and Belgium : 

Core : Coline Sauvand & Laurent Toulouse

Helped by Steph Martin, Sébastien André, Antoine Jonniaux and Gilles Tricoire

Website : 30birdsgame.com

Email : info[at]30birdsgame.com

Feedback is welcome. Our goal is to make a full game out of this concept, so we need some testing to improve the gameplay. 

Enjoy !
